lines.name: Ancestral Vision

implicitModifiers.text: Item sells for much more to vendors

explicitModifiers.text: Modifiers to Chance to Suppress Spell Damage also apply to Chance to Avoid Elemental Ailments at 50% of their Value

lines.flavourText:
The spirits of our ancestors guided us from the Archipelago to the continent.
Inextricably, the purity of our souls is linked to the ones who came before us.

lines.name: Careful Planning

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana
(5-6)% increased Area of Effect of Aura Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Intelligence from Passives in Radius is Transformed to Dexterity

lines.flavourText:
"Greatly outnumbered, Deshret dressed her personal guard 
in identical garb. When the Empire rode north, Deshret and 
her guard took turns revealing themselves, creating the illusion 
of speed beyond the capabilities of even the Virtue Gems."
- History of the Maraketh

lines.name: The Long Winter

implicitModifiers.text: 20% increased total Recovery per second from Life Leech

explicitModifiers.text: With 40 Intelligence in Radius, Glacial Cascade has an additional Burst

With 40 Intelligence in Radius, 20% of Glacial Cascade Physical Damage
Converted to Cold Damage

lines.flavourText:
In the years that followed the twisted sky,
cold winds cloaked Wraeclast in snow.
The pure-white blanket masked a black heart
that lay dormant deep beneath the earth.

lines.name: Rolling Flames

implicitModifiers.text: 15% reduced Effect of Chill on you
15% reduced Effect of Shock on you
1% of Damage taken Recouped as Mana

explicitModifiers.text: With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball Projectiles gain Radius as they travel farther, up to +4 Radius
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball Projectiles gain Area as they travel farther, up to 50% increased Area of Effect
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball cannot ignite
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Projectiles gain radius as they travel farther, up to a maximum of +0.4 metres to radius
With at least 40 Intelligence in Radius, Fireball has +(30-50)% chance to inflict scorch

lines.flavourText:
From north to south the sea of fire swept,
Rolling waves of gorging flame,
Growing taller and hungrier,
With every land they consumed.
